name: VIRA (itch)
description:
VIRA

A casual infinite runner game where you must dodge or break though incoming objects. You have three lives and one is taken away when you hit something and one is given back when you hit a life pole. You are able to dash and while dashing you can brake though all objects. This ability is a one shot unless you refill it by hitting a big tower.

CONTROLS

W D and left analog- Move left and right

Space and Y- Dash
